item.title: Eat to Beat Disease
item.description: What should be added into my diet : Cancer-fighting defense system : soy bean or fermented soy products / broccoli (1 and 2 cups a week) Ability to repair and regenerate : a cup of cocoa Health-giving bacteria : fruit / sauerkraut / cheese Immune system : white button mushroom / virgin olive oil DNA protection : nuts (10g per day) / berries Moderate drinking / Spicy food / Hard cheese is OK References > Version Control Version Action Time 1.0 Init 2019-06-06

item.title: Viva La Vida
item.description: I used to rule the world Seas would rise when I gave the word Now in the morning I sleep alone Sweep the street I used to own I used to roll the dice Feel the fear in my enemy’s eye Listen as the crowed would sing “Now the old king is dead! Long live the king!” One minute I held the key Next the walls were closed on me And I discovered that my castles stand Upon pillars of salt, pillars of sand I hear Jerusalum bells a-ringing Roman Cavalry choirs are singing Be my mirror my sword and shield My missionaries in a foreign field For some reason I can’t explain Once you go there was never, never an honest word That was when I ruled the world It was the wicked and wild wind Blew down the doors to let me in Shattered windows and the sound of drums People could not believe what I’d become Revolutionaries wait For my head on a silver plate Just a puppet on a lonely string Oh who would ever want to be king? I hear Jerusalum bells a-ringing Roman Cavalry choirs are singing Be my mirror my sword and shield

item.title: Linux基础： 帮助、查看、目录、文件操作
item.description: 0. 命令导航 类型 相关命令 帮助 –help, man, which, clear, > , mtools 查看 echo, cat, more, find, grep, | 目录 cd , ls, pwd 安装、登陆 login, shutdown, halt, reboot, install, mount, umount, chsh, exit, last 文件操作 touch, mkdir, rm, rmdir, mv, cp, ln, file, dd, diff 解、压缩 tar, gzip, bzip2, zip, unzip, gunzip, unarj, uuencode, uudecode 系统管理 whoami, df, top, free, quota, at, lp, adduser, groupadd, kill, crontab 系统安全 passwd, su, umask, chgrp, chmod, chomd, chown, chattr, sudo ps, who 网络操作 ifconfig, ip, ping, netstat, telnet, ftp, route, rlogin, rcp, finger, rcp, finger, mail, nslookup 1. 帮助命令 2. 查看命令 3. 目录命令 4. 文件操作命令 References [ ] Version Control Version Action Time 1.0 Init 2019-05-08

item.title: [转]【Mac小白探索记】(1) 基本设置与常用软件
item.description: 序 原本打算将所有相关内容只写在一篇博文里，但后面发现越加越多，内容越来越零散，最后决定进行拆分，也变为一个系列。我是2017年底才刚开始深入使用mac，算是mac小白一枚，在探索的过程中想将一些我觉得高效实用的信息记录下来，希望其他和我一样刚开始学习mac的小伙伴们能看了后有所帮助。 第一篇主要介绍新入手mac后的基本设置与常用软件安装。终于转到有terminal的电脑上了，既然换了Mac OS，需要
